other_tests.findings: There are stones in the distended gallbladder with wall edema. The hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits. The contour of the liver is smooth. There is no focal liver mass. The main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. There is no ascites. There is no intrahepatic biliary dilation. The CHD measures 11 mm. The imaged portion of the pancreas appears within normal limits. Normal echogenicity of the spleen, measuring 8.9 cm. Limited views of the bilateral kidneys show no hydronephrosis. There is a small simple cyst arising from the upper pole of the left kidney.
